jcr:content.jcr:title: Wikipedia:WikiProject Primates/species taxobox example with picture

contentheadline.headline: Wikipedia:WikiProject Primates/species taxobox example with picture

contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | name = Indri | image = Indris 1882 encyclopedia.jpg | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Mammal]]ia | ordo = [[Primate]]s | familia = [[Indriidae]] | genus = '''''Indri''''' | genus_authority = [[Étienne Geoffroy Saint-Hilaire|É. Geoffroy]] and<br>[[Georges Cuvier|G. Cuvier]], 1796 | species = '''''I. indri''''' | binomial = ''Indri indri'' | binomial_authority = ([[Johann Friedrich Gmelin|Gmelin]], 1788) }} ==Things to note:== * Usually the taxobox heading is the '''common name''' of the organism in bold type. The taxobox name and the article title, should always be singular. * If there is '''no''' suitable '''common name''', use the '''scientific name''' instead. * There is no need for a caption below the picture if it shows a typical member of the species. (But if there is something unusual to note, e.g. juvenile, male/female colouring, activity, location etc., then add a caption.) * It is usually best not to provide an image_width parameter, as this over-rules users' default thumb size preferences; if it is necessary to do so, note that the [[Wikipedia:Manual of Style]] recommends that lead images not be made smaller than 300px, as this will make the lead image smaller than the others for users with a 300px default thumb size. <br style="clear:both"/> ==Taxobox markup== <pre> {{Taxobox | name = Indri | image = indris.jpg | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordate|Chordata]] | classis = [[Mammal]]ia | ordo = [[Primate]]s | familia = [[Indriidae]] | genus = '''''Indri''''' | genus_authority = [[Étienne Geoffroy Saint-Hilaire|É. Geoffroy]] and<br>[[Georges Cuvier|G. Cuvier]], 1796 | species = '''''I. indri''''' | binomial = ''Indri indri'' | binomial_authority = ([[Johann Friedrich Gmelin|Gmelin]], 1788) }} </pre> [[Category:WikiProject Primates]]
